Name: Everyday Anatomy VR
About the game: ***A VR HEADSET IS REQUIRED TO RUN EVERYDAY ANATOMY VR*** Everyday Anatomy is your shortcut to learning human structure and function. Based on award-winning content and industry-leading 3D anatomy models, the app prompts innovative experiential learning and training suitable for everyone. Several built-in features, anatomy annotation labels appearing during navigation ease the learning process and turn it into a fascinating human body exploration. Everyday Anatomy is inspiring to democratize anatomy learning, thus making a profound educational impact across the globe. Users can practice authentic anatomy content in a learner-centered approach on any device, including VR, enjoy self-directed study, critical thinking, and skill development. ABOUT EVERYDAY ANATOMY Everyday Anatomy is developed by Media Media, the multi-award-winning enterprise anatomy software developer for universities and hospitals. Everyday Anatomy is designed strictly for the individual user aiming for self-learning anatomy. MULTI-LANGUAGE CONTENT The database of anatomical definitions and terminology in Everyday Anatomy is translated into 15 languages. Find it in your language and start thriving in your learning journey today: English, simplified and traditional Chinese, Latin (terminology), German, French, Italian, Polish, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Ukrainian, Georgian, Thai, and Greek (UI only). Combine any two languages simultaneously to learning anatomy in two languages. In alignment with the instructional design principles and strategies involved in the learning cycle, the app is a paradigm for optimal anatomy education across a multisensory experience and furthers educational reform. FEATURES ***** 3D MODELS : Over 10,000 life-like and precise anatomical models for interactive learning. ***** REGIONAL ANATOMY : Contains hundreds of preconfigured anatomy models organized in 15 body systems. Each model entails all you need to start learning anatomy in an all-in-one guided environment. ***** BODY ACTIONS : Includes a comprehensive database on muscles, joints, and body function animations to visualize in real-time 3D. ***** MICROANATOMY MODELS : Contains over 15 full-thickness 3D histology models to consolidate your self-directed anatomy learning. ***** BONE MAPPING : Contains a state of the art and detailed color-mapping of the surfaces, borders, parts, and anatomical landmarks. ***** CLINICAL CORRELATIONS : The app integrates hundreds of definitions of clinical correlations organized per body system.
